code: import{SocialSharing}from"@ionic-native/social-sharing";import{IonLabel}from"@ionic/react";import React from"react";import{getBookingReciptForm,getTaxReciptForm}from"../../services/EndPointApi";import"./DownloadReciept.scss";const DownloadReciept=_ref=>{let{bookingReference,click}=_ref;async function downloadTax(form){let resp;if(form==="Tax"){resp=await getTaxReciptForm(bookingReference);}else if(form==="Booking"){resp=await getBookingReciptForm(bookingReference);}if(resp){click();SocialSharing.share("Your Payment Receipt",form+"-Receipt-"+bookingReference,"data:application/pdf;base64,"+resp.data,null);}}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"download-limk-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"each-link",onClick:()=>downloadTax("Tax")},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(IonLabel,null,"Download Tax Invoice")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"each-link",onClick:()=>downloadTax("Booking")},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(IonLabel,null,"Download Booking Invoice")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null));};export default DownloadReciept;
